ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a collection of interactive physics simulations, including demonstrations of Earth's magnetic field, electromagnetic solenoids, general relativity, and planetary orbits with Hohmann transfer. These simulations, generated via LLM prompting, are intended to visually illustrate complex physics concepts in an accessible manner.
